scripts.build-swagger: npx openapi-typescript https://dev.stretch.com/api/v1/admin/apidoc.json -o ./types/admin.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript https://dev.stretch.com/api/v1/auth/apidoc.json -o ./types/auth.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript https://dev.stretch.com/api/v1/chat/apidoc.json -o ./types/chat.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript https://dev.stretch.com/api/v1/coach/apidoc.json -o ./types/coach.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript https://dev.stretch.com/api/v1/nav/apidoc.json -o ./types/nav.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript https://dev.stretch.com/api/v1/notification/apidoc.json -o ./types/notification.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript https://dev.stretch.com/api/v1/payment/apidoc.json -o ./types/payment.d.ts && npx openapi-typescript https://dev.stretch.com/api/v1/storage/apidoc.json -o ./types/storage.d.ts
